plot: Two brothers hide in an old garage as the world crumbles under an alien invasion. But how long can they last with one brother injured and no help in sight?
title: A Silent Universe
plot_es: Two brothers hide in an old garage as the world crumbles under an alien invasion. But how long can they last with one brother injured and no help in sight?
plot_en: Two brothers hide in an old garage as the world crumbles under an alien invasion. But how long can they last with one brother injured and no help in sight?
